Package io.opentelemetry.trace.unsafe

Class ContextUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.opentelemetry.trace.unsafe.ContextUtils
  • public final class ContextUtils
extends Object
    Util methods/functionality to interact with the Context.

    Users must interact with the current Context via the public APIs in Tracer and avoid usages of the CONTEXT_SPAN_KEY directly.

    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static Span getValue​(io.grpc.Context context)
      Returns the value from the specified Context.

      Creates a new Context with the given value set.
